assetProfile.address2: 5th Floor Kamala City, Kamala Mills Compound Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel (West)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Siyaram Silk Mills Limited manufactures and sells fabrics, readymade garments, and dyed yarns in India. The company offers fabrics, including polyester viscose, polyester viscose linen and lycra, polyester rayon and cotton, polyester wool, polyester wool lycra, wool lycra and linen, wool, cotton, linen, and cotton linen fabrics; and CVC and PC yarn-dyed shirting. It also provides ready-made formal and casual wear; home furnishing fabrics; and garments, including formal wear, casual attire, corporate uniforms, and home furnishing fabrics, as well as tailoring service under brand name Tailor Fit. In addition, the company operates and franchises a chain of retail stores, which offer menswear fashion fabrics and apparels, and accessories under the Siyaram's Shop name; and exports its products to the United Kingdom, Europe, North America, Latin America, Gulf countries, and South-East Asia. The company sells its products under the Siyaram's Suitings and Shirtings, Mistair, Moretti, Royale Linen, Moretti, Miniature, Unicode, J. Hampstead, Oxemberg, Mozo, Cadini, and Casa Moda brand names. Siyaram Silk Mills Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Mumbai, India.
